title: Who's That Multimon?! Part 1 - Sprites and Dataloaders
tags: neural networks, multitask learning, computer vision, pytorch, pokémon
snippet: IntroductionA friend recently suggested it would be a fun challenge to see if you could build a neural network to identify Pokémon types using just their sprites. Given I was in the process of trying to get my head around neural networks and learning PyTorch at the time, this seemed like a fun li...
